deposit(address,uint256).details: only callable by Controllerdoesn't actually stakes the tokens but aggregates the balance in the tenderizer awaiting to be stakedrequires '_amount' to be approved by '_from'

stake(address,uint256).details: If '_account' is not specified, stake towards the default addressIf '_amount' is 0, stake the entire current token balance of the TenderizerOnly callable by controller

params._account: account to stake to in the underlying protocol

unstake(address,uint256).details: If '_account' is not specified, stake towards the default addressIf '_amount' is 0, unstake the entire amount staked towards _accountOnly callable by controller

params._account: account to unstake from in the underlying protocol

withdraw(address,uint256).details: If '_amount' isn't specified all unstake tokens by '_account' will be withdrawnRequires '_account' to have unstaked prior to calling withdrawOnly callable by controller

params._unstakeLockID: ID for the lock to request the withdraw for

claimRewards().notice: Claim staking rewards for the underlying protocol

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Withdraw '_amount' of tokens previously unstaked by '_account'
